Articles.Content: I just updated my game to .90 and it crashes before the loading screen comes up. All I get is is my mouses busy icon. If I press anything the game crashes. I tried re-installing it already, no help. My game worked fine before the update. HELP!!!

> 
> I just updated my game to .90 and it crashes before the loading screen comes up. All I get is is my mouses busy icon. If I press anything the game crashes. I tried re-installing it already, no help. My game worked fine before the update. HELP!!!

Did you try to click on the KSP exe icon in the KSP win folder? the launcher may be having troubles?

> 
> Did you try to click on the KSP exe icon in the KSP win folder? the launcher may be having troubles?

Yup, did that. Still crashes
Could you please provide your output\_log.txt file?

> 
> Could you please provide your output\_log.txt file?
